lyrics:
There's a light
a certain kind of light
that never shone on me
I want my life to be
lived with you
lived with you

There's a way
everybody says
to do each and every little thing
but what does it bring
if I ain't got you
if I ain't got you

(chorus)
baby you don't know what it's like
baby you don't know what it's like
to love somebody 
to love somebody 
the way I love you

In my mind 
I see your face again
I know my frame of mind
you ain't got to be so blind
but I'm blind 
so very blind

I'm a man
can't you see what I am
I live and breathe and for you
but what good does it do
if I ain't got you
if I ain't got you

(chorus)
baby you don't know what it's like
baby you don't know what it's like
to love somebody
to love somebody
the way I love you

(chorus)
